Class NewChutesAndLadders

java.lang.Object
  NewChutesAndLadders

public class NewChutesAndLadders
extends java.lang.Object

This class simulates a single-player game of Chutes and Ladders, while collecting and returning data gathered during the game (such as average number of chutes encountered)

Version:
02/11/2017
Author:
Matthew Pigliavento
